OpportunityID.title: OpportunityID
OpportunityID.description: This is the 18 or 15 digit Opportunity record ID needed to Create New Business Quote.

ServiceStartDate.title: ServiceStartDate
ServiceStartDate.description: This is the Start Date of the New Business Quote. ServiceStartDate is of type Date.

Term.title: Term
Term.description: This is the Term of the New Business Quote. Term is of type Integer expressed in Months.
